pages.text: $(#630000)Travelling on horseback was never really my forte before I made this. Assimilated Horses, however, are much stronger than normal horses, so I opted for a method to use one of those instead.

$(#630000)By giving a Factory a Saddle, I can create a saddle variant that works for certain parasites. This Bloodstained Saddle also increases the parasite's step height to 1 block, if applicable.$(br)I can tell which parasites it can be used on if there are blue particles emitted.
